00016 /*
00017         ATTENTION! COCOS2D USERS
00018  
00019         Large change: Include and use SpaceManagerCocos2d class now found
00020         in the ccExtras folder. This design change gives a better seperation
00021         and will prove much more flexible in the long run, thanks for
00022         understanding.
00023  
00024     Also, note you will not want to include the PhysicsEditorExtras folder
00025     if you are not using PhysicsEditor support; your app will not compile.
00026  
00027         p.s. You may need to add the ccExtras folder path to your
00028         "Header Search Paths" found under your Target Info->Build area.
00029  */
00030

00084 @interface SpaceManager : NSObject
00085 {
00086         
00087 @protected
00088         /* our chipmunk space! */
00089         cpSpace *_space;
00090         
00091         /* Internal devices (dev: Consider revamping) */
00092         NSMutableArray *_invocations;
00093 
00094         /* Helpful Shapes/Bodies */
00095         cpShape *topWall,*bottomWall,*rightWall,*leftWall;
00096         
00097         /* Number of steps (across dt) perform on each step call */
00098         int     _steps;
00099         
00100         /* The dt used last within step */
00101         cpFloat _lastDt;
00102         
00103         /* If constant dt used, then this accumulates left over */
00104         cpFloat _timeAccumulator;
00105                 
00106         /* Options:
00107                 -cleanupBodyDependencies will also free contraints connected to a free'd shape
00108                 -constraintCleanupDelegate is the delegate that will be called when the above variable is true
00109                 -rehashStaticEveryStep will rehash static shapes at the end of every step
00110                 -iterateFunc; default will update cocosnodes for pos and rotation
00111                 -constantDt; set this to a non-zero number to always step the simulation with that dt
00112         */
00113         BOOL                                                    _cleanupBodyDependencies;
00114         id<cpConstraintCleanupDelegate> _constraintCleanupDelegate;
00115         BOOL                                                    _rehashStaticEveryStep;
00116         smgrIterateFunc                 _iterateFunc;
00117     smgrEachFunc                    _eachFunc;
00118         cpFloat                                                 _constantDt;
00119 }
